title: Robin Williams, Comedic Master And Oscar Winner, Dies At 63
teaser: Robin Williams has died at the age of 63. Williams is remembered for his roles in TV and film, including an inspiring teacher in Dead Poet's Society and an Oscar-winning turn in Good Will Hunting.
contentencoded:
Robin Williams has died at the age of 63. Williams is remembered for his roles in TV and film â€” including a radio DJ in Good Morning Vietnam, an inspiring teacher in Dead Poet's Society and his Oscar-winning turn as a therapist in Good Will Hunting. Entertainment reporter Steve Zeitchik discusses Williams' legacy.
